hero.title: Disaster Response
hero.subtitle: When Every Second Counts
hero.description: Real-time disaster reporting and coordination platform connecting communities, responders, and resources when it matters most.

emergencyResponse.title: Emergency Response
emergencyResponse.description: Rapid coordination when every second counts

communityUnity.title: Community Unity
communityUnity.description: Bringing people together in times of crisis

stats.impactDescription: Our platform transforms disaster response globally, connecting communities and saving lives through advanced technology and seamless coordination.

liveImpact.title: Making Real Impact Worldwide
liveImpact.subtitle: Live Global Impact
liveImpact.description: Our platform coordinates real-time disaster response across the globe. See live incidents, active response teams, and communities we're helping right now.

realTimeReporting.title: Real-Time Reporting
realTimeReporting.description: Instant disaster reporting with GPS location, photos, and priority classification for immediate response coordination.

emergencyCoordination.title: Emergency Coordination
emergencyCoordination.description: Connect emergency responders, volunteers, and resources for efficient disaster response and recovery operations.

communityAlerts.title: Community Alerts
communityAlerts.description: Automated alert system that notifies communities about potential disasters and emergency situations in their area.

resourceManagement.title: Resource Management
resourceManagement.description: Track and coordinate emergency resources, supplies, and personnel for optimal disaster response effectiveness.

safety.title: Stay Safe & Be Prepared
safety.subtitle: Emergency Preparedness
safety.description: Essential safety tips and emergency preparedness guidelines to protect you and your loved ones during disasters. Knowledge saves lives.

emergencyKit.title: Emergency Kit Essentials
emergencyKit.description: Prepare a comprehensive emergency kit with water, non-perishable food, flashlight, first aid supplies, and important documents. Keep enough supplies for at least 72 hours.
tips: 1 gallon of water per person per day

evacuationPlanning.title: Evacuation Planning
evacuationPlanning.description: Create and practice evacuation routes with your family. Know multiple ways to exit your home and neighborhood, and establish meeting points.

communicationStrategy.title: Communication Strategy
communicationStrategy.description: Establish a family communication plan with out-of-state contacts. Ensure everyone knows how to reach each other during emergencies.

homeSafety.title: Home Safety Measures
homeSafety.description: Secure your home against disasters by installing smoke detectors, securing heavy furniture, and knowing utility shut-off locations.
tips: Install smoke and carbon monoxide detectors

communityPreparedness.title: Community Preparedness
communityPreparedness.description: Connect with neighbors and local emergency services. Join community emergency response teams and stay informed about local hazards.
tips: Know your neighbors and their skills

digitalPreparedness.title: Digital Preparedness
digitalPreparedness.description: Back up important documents digitally, keep devices charged, and download emergency apps for real-time alerts and information.
tips: Back up documents to cloud storage

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join thousands of people using DisasterWatch to build safer, more resilient communities worldwide.

emergencyResponse.title: Ready to Respond to Emergencies?
emergencyResponse.subtitle: Emergency Response
emergencyResponse.description: As an authorized responder, you have the power to coordinate emergency response and save lives. Every second counts in disaster management.

volunteer.title: Ready to Become a Community Hero?
volunteer.subtitle: Become a Hero
volunteer.description: Join thousands of volunteers worldwide who are making a real difference in their communities. Your skills, time, and compassion can help save lives and rebuild hope.

hero.title: About DisasterWatch
hero.description: Empowering communities with real-time disaster reporting and coordinated emergency response

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create a safer world by connecting communities, enabling rapid disaster response, and empowering people with the tools they need to protect and support each other during emergencies.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Trusted disaster reporting and response coordination when communities need it most.

communityFirst.title: Community First
communityFirst.description: Empowering local communities with tools to protect and support each other.

rapidResponse.title: Rapid Response
rapidResponse.description: Real-time alerts and immediate action to minimize disaster impact.

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Connecting communities worldwide for shared disaster preparedness and response.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: DisasterWatch is a comprehensive disaster management platform that bridges the gap between communities and emergency responders. We provide real-time reporting, coordinated response, and vital resources when disasters strike.

realTimeMonitoring.title: Real-Time Monitoring
realTimeMonitoring.description: 24/7 disaster tracking and community reporting system

communityNetwork.title: Community Network
communityNetwork.description: Connect with local volunteers and emergency responders

organization.title: Our Organization
organization.description: Built by a dedicated team of emergency management professionals, technologists, and community advocates committed to making disaster response more effective and accessible.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Emergency management specialists, software engineers, and community organizers working together to save lives and protect communities.

globalNetwork.title: Global Network
globalNetwork.description: Partnering with emergency services, NGOs, and community organizations worldwide to create a comprehensive disaster response ecosystem.

innovation.title: Innovation Driven
innovation.description: Continuously improving our platform with cutting-edge technology, user feedback, and lessons learned from real-world disaster response.

leadership.title: Our Leadership Team
leadership.description: Meet the experienced professionals leading DisasterWatch's mission to transform disaster response and build resilient communities worldwide.

sarahChen.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
sarahChen.title: Executive Director
sarahChen.bio: Former FEMA Regional Administrator with 15+ years in emergency management. PhD in Crisis Leadership from Harvard. Led response efforts for major disasters affecting over 2 million people.

michaelRodriguez.name: Captain Michael Rodriguez
michaelRodriguez.title: Emergency Response Coordinator
michaelRodriguez.bio: 20-year veteran firefighter and paramedic. Certified Emergency Manager (CEM) specializing in multi-agency coordination. Coordinates real-time response operations across 12 states.

priyaPatel.name: Dr. Priya Patel
priyaPatel.title: Technology Director
priyaPatel.bio: Former Google AI researcher with expertise in real-time data systems. PhD in Computer Science from MIT. Pioneered machine learning applications for disaster prediction and response optimization.

mariaSantos.name: Maria Santos
mariaSantos.title: Community Outreach Manager
mariaSantos.bio: Former Red Cross International Operations Manager. Fluent in 5 languages. Masters in International Relations. Built volunteer networks in 25+ countries and trained over 10,000 community responders.

jamesThompson.name: James Thompson
jamesThompson.title: Operations Manager
jamesThompson.bio: Former military logistics officer with NATO peacekeeping experience. MBA in Operations Management. Specializes in resource coordination and supply chain management for emergency response operations.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join our community of emergency responders, volunteers, and concerned citizens working together to build safer, more resilient communities.

reports.title: Disaster Reports
reports.subtitle: Real-time incident tracking and response coordination

descriptions.regularUser: Stay informed about verified disaster reports and safety updates in your community. Access reliable information to keep yourself and your family safe.
descriptions.responder: Real-time disaster reports from communities worldwide. Browse verified incidents, track emergency responses, and stay informed about ongoing situations in your area.

communityBanner.title: Community Safety Information
communityBanner.description: You are viewing verified disaster reports and safety updates. All information has been reviewed by our emergency response team to ensure accuracy and reliability for community safety.

searchAndFilters.searchPlaceholder: Search reports by title, description, or location...

noResults.title: No reports found
noResults.description: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters to find more reports.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: We're Here to Help
hero.description: Whether you need emergency assistance, have questions about our services, or want to partner with us, our dedicated team is ready to support you around the clock.

methods.title: How Can We Help You?
methods.description: Choose the best way to reach us based on your needs and urgency level.

emergency.title: Emergency Hotline
emergency.description: 24/7 emergency response for urgent disasters and critical situations

email.title: General Inquiries
email.description: For questions, partnerships, and general support

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

placeholders.name: Enter your full name
placeholders.subject: Brief subject of your message
placeholders.message: Please provide detailed information about your inquiry...

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

office.title: Our Office
office.description: Visit us or get in touch through our main office location.

map.title: Find Us
map.description: Visit our headquarters in Yangon, Myanmar

footer.description: Connecting communities and saving lives through advanced disaster management technology.

donate.title: Support Our Mission
donate.subtitle: Help us save lives and build resilient communities

cta.title: Every Donation Saves Lives
cta.description: Your contribution directly funds emergency response, medical aid, and community rebuilding efforts worldwide.
